description: Built for mountain and city life, this retro-inspired down jacket has modern updates and provides warmth and functionality in various inclement weather conditions. With a shell made of NetPlus® 100% postconsumer recycled nylon made from recycled fishing nets to help reduce ocean plastic pollution.
name: Patagonia Downdrift Jacket - Mens

specs.value: Coated 4-ply, 4.2-oz NetPlus® 100% postconsumer recycled nylon faille made from recycled ﬁshing nets to help reduce ocean plastic pollution; with a PFC-free DWR ﬁnish (durable water repellent coating that does not contain perﬂuorinated chemicals)
2.2-oz 100% recycled polyester taffeta with a PFC-free DWR ﬁnish
600-ﬁll-power 100% Recycled Down (duck and goose down reclaimed from down products)
